title: Improve WhatsApp prefilled message text from Contact form (include all client details)

requirements.text: Update the WhatsApp deep-link prefilled text generated after a successful contact form submission so it includes every contact form field (name, email, phone, message) in a clear, copy/paste-friendly format for fast replies, and always targets the dedicated contact-form WhatsApp number from configuration (siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber).

quotes: make the text of your messege in contact form to reach the whatsapp number i provided with every details in contact form as the data of client so i can reply them fast

acceptanceCriteria: After submitting the Contact form successfully, clicking "Continue on WhatsApp" opens a wa.me link that uses siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber (not the general site WhatsApp number).
The prefilled WhatsApp message includes labeled lines for Name, Email, Phone, and Message.
If the user did not enter a phone number, the message still includes a Phone line with a clear placeholder (e.g., "Phone: Not provided").
The WhatsApp message formatting uses line breaks so each field is easy to scan in WhatsApp.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change backend contact-form storage or admin retrieval behavior.
Do not add any new third-party WhatsApp API integration; keep using wa.me deep links only.
